short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically restores deleted posts and comments on Reddit using the Arctic Shift API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will automatically restore deleted posts and comments as you browse Reddit.

It works on both the current Reddit UI and on the old Reddit UI (old.reddit.com)

Archived posts and comments are retrieved from the Arctic Shift API: https://github.com/ArthurHeitmann/arctic_shift

Available on GitHub: https://github.com/Fubs/reddit-uncensored
